description: Process supervisor that keeps copilot-api running as a background daemon on Windows
post_install: Write-Host 'Run "copilot-daemon install" to register as a startup daemon.' -ForegroundColor Green
notes: Prerequisites: npx copilot-api@latest auth  (authenticate with GitHub Copilot)
copilot-daemon install    # register scheduled task + start
Optional: place config.json next to the exe to configure port or do_not_kill_existing
